tool_description: Enrich your data with just an email or a domain. Personnalize your users onboarding with their colors, logo, company description and much more.
name: informatron - logo - colors and infos scraper
title: informatron - logo - colors and infos scraper
tool_name: informatron - logo - colors and infos scraper

api_list.name: Get domain infos from a simple url or email
api_list.description:
Get domain infos from a simple url or email.

**Warning** do not include `http://` or `https://` in your domains, because it's a GET request it will corrupt the endpoint. Use the POST request if you do want to pass urls including `https://` or `http://`.

The `palette` object gives you 6 colors with luminosity. The first color can be usually considered the primary color. You can check the `isLightColor` variable to pick a color that will contrast with your background (choose a light color on a dark background and vice-versa).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://informatron-logo-colors-and-infos-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/api/domain/infos/stackoverflow.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "informatron-logo-colors-and-infos-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://informatron-logo-colors-and-infos-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/api/domain/infos/{domainoremail}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "informatron-logo-colors-and-infos-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
